mosinstall.name: Joomlaspan Google AdSense 2.1 Clicksafe
mosinstall.author: Joomlaspan
mosinstall.description:
Joomlaspan Modules Support Forum:

You are welcome to register and participate in this free support forum.

This is an advanced module with a brand new feature to block Google AdSense Ads from specific IP numbers. If you don't know what is IP number or are not sure of the use, do not use this feature. There is another module (Regular) available at Joomlaspan for you!

Updated on 17th July to add better css support, due to issues raised by users, make it completely XHTML compliant and to remove all deafult ID and alternate ads.

This module utilizes the Google AdSense Chameleon codes. Learn more about this here.

param.label: Div CSS codes
param.description: Input any css code that you want here. By default, width and height are autoadjusted based on the ad format that you choose.

param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_client
param.label: Client ID
param.description: Please type your Client ID provided by Google AdSense.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_format
param.label: Ad layout
param.description: Choose the ad format and size that you would like to display on your page.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_channel
param.label: Ad Channel
param.description: Type the channel ID that you may have set in Google AdSense Admin options. It is advisable to assign a channel to track your earnings better.

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_type
param.label: Ad Type
param.description: Choose the ad types you would like to display on your page. If you are choosing Image Ads only option, plase use only these sizes: 728X90 - Leaderboard, 468X60 - Banner, 300X250 - Medium Rectangle, 160X600 - Wide Skyscraper and 120X600 - Skyscraper

param.name: joomlaspan_ad_in_frame
param.label: Framed pages
param.description: Select this option if your page uses frames.
param.option: Ad will be placed in a framed page
